items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Utility bill found in DIMS data.
Annual accounts for 2020-2022 available with Ellipro scores.
Bank account and postal details are available in DIMS data.
Headquarters address matches GLEIF API data.
Jurisdiction confirmed as Great Britain (GB) from GLEIF API data.
AML and Data Protection compliance confirmed; Industry license under review.
Engages in multiple financial services and demonstrates strong performance across sectors.
Multiple screenings conducted; one confirmed match under investigation.
Reported record revenue for 2023 at $158.1 billion in total net revenue.
Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 was $489,320 million.
